com.example.hotpot0.section2.controllers

Class ProfileEditHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hotpot0.section2.controllers.ProfileEditHandler

  • public class ProfileEditHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles operations related to editing and managing user profiles.

    This class provides methods to update user details, validate inputs, and delete user profiles in the Firestore database using ProfileDB.

      Constructs a new ProfileEditHandler.

    • Method Detail

      • handleProfileUpdate

        public void handleProfileUpdate(Context context,
                                int userID,
                                java.lang.String newName,
                                java.lang.String newEmailID,
                                java.lang.String newPhoneNumber,
                                java.lang.Boolean notificationsEnabled,
                                ProfileDB.ActionCallback callback)
        Handles the updating of user profile details.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        userID - The user ID of the profile to update
        newName - The new name to update to
        newEmailID - The new email to update to
        newPhoneNumber - The new phone number to update to
        callback - A callback interface to notify success or failure
